About Me
Let me tell you a little about myself and What i do..

Your Project In His Safe Hands

I'm a full stack Developer for kolkata in West Bengal, India. I have serious passion for UI effects, animations and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences. Let's make something special.

React

i prefer to work with reacts framework as it helps me to build user interfaces, or UIs. In terms of websites and web applications. it gives me ability to work with a virtual browser that is more friendly than the real browser.

Bootstrap

Bootstrap is my second choice. I use bootstrap to create modern websites and web apps & since It's open-source and free to use, yet features numerous HTML and CSS templates for UI interface elements such as buttons and forms.

Node Js

I use Node Js for backend as its non-blocking, event-driven servers and its single-threaded nature & also it allows me to execute Javascript code outside of the browser.
